children.value:
provides in-context information that briefly explain the function of a
UI element.
will apply a tooltip to a single wrapped Element.

<Playground>
  <Tooltip message="'tis a button">
    <Button label="Hover On Me" />
  </Tooltip>
  <Tooltip message="'tis also a button">
    <Button label="Hover On Me Too" />
  </Tooltip>
</Playground>
